item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Anne Lamott
Stephanie add a quote by John O'Donohue
Stephanie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "And this mess is so big And so deep and so tall, We cannot pick it up. There is no way at all!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by LaoTze
item.description: "By doing nothing, nothing is left undone." -- LaoTze

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Wayne Muller
item.description: "Emptiness is the pregnant void out of which all creation springs. But many of us fear emptiness. We prefer to remain...surrounded by things...we imagine are subject to our control." -- Wayne Muller

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Reinhold Niebuhr
item.description:
"Nothing that is worth doing can be achieved in our lifetime; therefore we must be saved by hope.
Nothing which is true or beautiful or good makes complete sense in any immediate context of history; therefore we must be saved by faith.
Nothing we do, however virtuous, can be accomplished alone; therefore we must be saved by love.
No virtuous act is quite as virtuous from the standpoint of our friend or foe as it is from our standpoint. Therefore we must be saved by the final form of love which is forgiveness." -- Reinhold Niebuhr

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by John C. Lilly
item.description: "You don't have to suffer continual chaos in order to grow." -- John C. Lilly

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Ovid
item.description: "By yielding you may obtain victory" -- Ovid

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Let us spend one day as deliberately as Nature, and not be thrown off the track by every nutshell and mosquito's wing that falls on the rails." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Rose Macaulay
item.description: "Life, for all its agonies...is exciting and beautiful, amusing and artful and endearing...and whatever is to come after it -- we shall not have this life again." -- Rose Macaulay

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Louis Koster
item.description: "Only where there is language is there world. - Martin Heidegger" -- Louis Koster

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by John Cowper Powys
item.description: "One needs no strange spiritual faith to worship the earth." -- John Cowper Powys

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Friedrich Schiller
item.description: "Did you think the lion was sleeping because he didn't roar?" -- Friedrich Schiller
